title: Prompt injection explained, with video, slides, and a transcript
dot:
digraph PromptInjection{label="Prompt Injection Webinar Overview";fontsize=20; node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue, fontname="Helvetica"]; Introduction[label="Introduction to Prompt Injection
by Simon Willison
LangChain Webinar May 2, 2023"];Definition[label="What is Prompt Injection?
Attack against applications built on AI models
Not an attack on AI models themselves"];Examples[label="Examples of Prompt Injection
1. Translation App
2. Bing's 'Sydney' Persona"];Risks[label="Risks of Prompt Injection
Can lead to serious security breaches
Manipulation of AI assistants"];ProposedSolutions[label="Proposed Solutions
1. Prompt Begging
2. Detecting Attacks in Input/Output"];Critique[label="Critique of Proposed Solutions
Security based on probability is inadequate"];DualLLMPattern[label="Dual Language Model Pattern
Use two LLMs: Privileged & Quarantined"];Conclusion[label="Conclusion
Understand prompt injection risks
Need for awareness and community discussion"];QnA[label="Q&A Session
Discussion on security measures and community building"];Introduction->Definition;Definition->Examples;Definition->Risks;Risks->ProposedSolutions;ProposedSolutions->Critique;Critique->DualLLMPattern;DualLLMPattern->Conclusion;Conclusion->QnA;}
